description: Configuration for Workday XLSX import. Column detection uses header matching.
notes: Column matching: looks for exact header match first, then prefix match (ignoring photo columns)
For each field, multiple possible header names are listed - first match wins
header_row indicates which row contains column headers (1-indexed)
Set optional_headers values to enable ID-based matching when your export includes employee IDs
Adjust request_types if your Workday uses different text for self vs other requests
